Text: Todule̩ uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ ide-wñ de, kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai oji ajo̩-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ o̩jo̩ du.
Ame̩ ki la ma eñini-i: todu i chʼamo̩ma-me̩ oñ nako̩la ñwu ma-i n, ma mʼo̩ n, ma li o̩la ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ko̩ me̩ n, kpai unana-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki gbiti kpai o̩wo̩-wñ kʼi nadala te̩,
kpai ujiwe-wñ kpai e̩wñ kʼi che Fero onu Ijipti alumeji ane̩ Ijipti le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka;

kpai e̩wñ kʼi che abogu Ijipti kpai amanya-ma, kpai o̩ko̩ ogu-ma; alu kʼi je̩ ñw omi Ohimini Ekpikpa mucha abʼuma ma abu ku ma nʼume̩ ule, kpai alu ki Jihofa je̩ ñw oji-ma ki lenyo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini kide̩;
kpai e̩wñ kʼi che me̩ ef aje̩tachi gbogbo taku me̩ wʼugbo kide̩;

kpai e̩wñ kʼi che Detan kpai Abiram, amo̩ma Eliab, o̩ma Rube̩n le̩; alu kʼane̩pe̩te̩ mʼalu-wñ chi te̩ kʼi ño̩ mʼuma ko mi, manyʼabo unyi-ma kpai unyabo-ma, kpai e̩wñ du ki deju kʼi tʼuma ubi, o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ abo Israe̩l chaka;
todu eju-me̩ fʼuko̩lo̩ inaina du ki Jihofa che li me̩.
Todule̩ ame̩ ki de uko̩ du kʼu nate̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i, kʼame̩ ki fʼukpahiu ne̩, ku me̩ nyʼejefu agba ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ daba anyi ku me̩ ne̩ le̩,
kʼame̩ ki ño̩ kpojolugbo oj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-me̩ ka kʼi adu ñwu ma kpai ugbe̩-ma, ane̩ kʼomie̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ le̩.
Todu ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ gba le̩ biu ane̩ Ijipti ugbo ku me̩ kwo wa le̩ n, ugbo kʼe̩ dʼe̩yo̩-we̩ gbe̩, tak e̩ nʼe̩re̩-we̩ che omiofo nyʼu, dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ uche̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩;
ama ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ daba agba le̩ chʼane̩ uwo kpai o̩go̩, i añmo̩ omi kwef omi ojale,
owñ chʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ afejutʼo̩; eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kadʼo pioo, akwo uchane̩ o̩do̩ gbogbo tʼukpoji o̩do̩.
Oñ i awatu, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ anyʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼomi añwa ñwu me̩ eñini-i eti o̩gbali, ku me̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, ku me̩ la rʼo̩ kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka kpai onugo-me̩ chaka,
mak owñ adʼomi ojale ane̩-me̩ wa iko-wñ, owñ chʼomi ojo̩do̩ kpai omi otitala; kʼuwe̩ ki kʼo̩ka-we̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ etito̩ kpai ekpo-we̩ wa unyi.
Oñ i akʼije̩ jʼoko-we̩ tod ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩, uwe̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ kʼefu-we̩ ako̩.
Ame̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de, tode̩gba ku ma gba me̩ ibe̩, kʼame̩ muna tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, ku me̩ chane̩ erʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ku me̩ la dojikane̩ ñwu ma,
kʼuwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼume̩ ma, kʼi la fʼo̩na ojale re, kʼomi ki we elo̩, tak ane̩ ñʼarʼo̩je̩ ge̩ n, kʼame̩ lenyo̩ bʼane̩ ki nyo̩ ki Jihofa adu ñwu me̩-i te̩ piopio.
Todule̩ ame̩ ki ko o̩la-mi-i jo̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩ kpai ef onugo-me̩; me̩ ki la fʼu ji manyʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ki chʼujiwe, i ki mud e̩wñ o̩gba oji-me̩ agbagba igbegbeneju-me̩.
Me̩ ki la dʼu ko̩ amo̩ma-me̩, e̩ ki nʼoluka-wñ ache e̩gba kʼe̩ gugu ef unyi-we̩ kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ dʼej o̩na alule̩ kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ dachi kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ kwane̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki dʼu ko̩ nyʼo̩la oli alugbo̩na unyi-we̩ kpai o̩la e̩wñ ku ma du re ajaku, alaku-we̩,
todu kʼojo̩lugbo-me̩ kpai ojolugbo amo̩ma-me̩ ki kpo̩kpe̩ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-me̩ ka kʼi adu ñwu ma, alu kʼukpo̩kpe̩ ojolugbo efojale ki dʼate̩ ñw ile̩-i de̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ de uko̩ du kʼu ñwa ñwu me̩-i kpaka, ku me̩ fʼu che, ku me̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, ku me̩ tʼo̩na-wñ chaka ale, ku me̩ jimʼowñ,
mak e̩gba le̩ Jihofa anʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi-i chaka dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, oñ ame̩ abʼabo uche̩ichi ki wewe ki ño̩ gbiti tʼume̩ le gbʼane̩.
Ugbo du ku me̩ adʼadaba e̩re̩-me̩ tʼo̩ amud e-me̩; alu o̩me̩ ane̩-me̩ ate̩ kwʼaje̩tachi gbogbo wa Le̩bano̩n kpai akwo o̩la ohimini, owñ chʼohimini Yufretis, gbogbo wa kado ohimini e-olane̩ le̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi neke nʼe̩re̩ane̩ o̩gba-me̩ ade̩ n; Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adʼe̩gahi-me̩ kpai ailo-me̩ abʼane̩ du ku me̩ dʼe̩re̩ tʼo̩ ma, alu kʼi katane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩.
Go, e̩nyo̩ kpai ama oñ omi ako jo̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i:
iche̩wñ ku me̩ gbʼuko̩ uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩ eñini-i gbo̩, mak e̩nyo̩ i che,
i muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ ma gbʼuko̩ uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ gbo̩ n, kʼame̩ la muna bʼo̩na kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩ eñini-i te̩, ku me̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma mʼo̩ n ubi, mak ama i che ñwu me̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼuwe̩ wʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ agudu nyi kʼe̩ gba le̩, mak uwe̩ ki dʼe̩nyo̩ le̩ gugu oj uwo Gerizim, oñ ama le̩ agugu oji uwo Ebal.
I chʼuwo le̩ jʼudaba Jo̩rdan ejano̩mo̩ o̩na kʼi le rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, oj ane̩ abo Kenan ku ma dodo egbili ki kpejuru Araba, me̩ru Gilgal o̩la oli Ok e-More le̩ n?
Todu edaba me̩ adaba Jo̩rdan-i ku me̩ gudu nyʼo̩mo̩ ku me̩ gba ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adu ñwu me̩; ame̩ ki bʼuma gba ku me̩ la dodo jʼo̩mo̩.
Ame̩ ki la fejutʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ chaka, kpai oji ajo̩ e-kʼu nako jo̩ o̩gba-me̩ eñini-i, ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ.
